snippet1.title: Setting Linebreaks to \n for all Files in directory
snippet1.description: Setting Linebreaks to \n for all Files in directory
snippet1.code: for f in /foo/bar*.yaml; do vim $f -c "set ff=unix" -c ":wq";done

snippet2.title: How to use find in Linux
snippet2.description: Find a file fitting the reg-exp (jpg) for their name anywhere in Linux
